set.name: DMART-17 Fabulous Art: Neon Light Girl

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one to your opponent, add it to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the revealed card is fire or nature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger" when added to your hand from your shield zone. ■ Revolution 0: If you have no shields, this creature gets +10000 power, "speed attacker" and "triple breaker".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-17 Fabulous Art: Neon Light Girl

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger: Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution light or fire creature, put it, and put this creature on top of it. ■ Neo Evolution: You may put it on one of your light or fire creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a non-creature card in the battle zone and destroy it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-17 Fabulous Art: Neon Light Girl

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} When you put this creature, your opponent can't attack with creatures this turn. ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-17 Fabulous Art: Neon Light Girl

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, use the next ability 3 times: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {SUPER}When you put this creature, put any number of creatures that cost 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-17 Fabulous Art: Neon Light Girl
